name: Marvila In Progress
description:
Game created for BiblioJam2019. This game jam took place in Marvila, a city in Portugal that was also the source for the theme of this jam, Marvila in the past, present and future.

The game is in Portuguese... Sorry for that.

Game Created by:

Inês Garcia - Graphics and illustration.

Tiago Cruz - Script.

Nuno Xu - Programmer.

Rodrigo Pinheiro - Music/Sound and UI.

And... We won first prize, Yay!
